verses.verse: Then Job <WH347> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>,
How long will ye vex <WH3013> my soul <WH5315>, And break <WH1792> me in pieces with words <WH4405>?
These ten <WH6235> times <WH6471> have ye reproached <WH3637> me <WH954>: Ye are not ashamed that ye deal hardly with me <WH1970>.
And be it indeed <WH551> that I have erred <WH7686>, Mine error <WH4879> remaineth with myself <WH3885>.
If indeed <WH551> ye will magnify <WH1431> yourselves against me <WH3198>, And plead against me my reproach <WH2781>;
Know <WH3045> now <WH645> that God <WH433> hath subverted <WH5791> me in my cause <WH5362>, And hath compassed me with his net <WH4686>.
Behold <WH6817>, I cry out of wrong <WH2555>, but I am not heard <WH6030>: I cry <WH7768> for help <WH4941>, but there is no justice.
He hath walled up <WH1443> my way <WH734> that I cannot pass <WH5674>, And hath set <WH7760> darkness <WH2822> in my paths <WH5410>.
He hath stripped <WH6584> me of my glory <WH3519>, And taken <WH5493> the crown <WH5850> from my head <WH7218>.
He hath broken <WH5422> me down on every side <WH5439>, and I am gone <WH3212>; And my hope <WH8615> hath he plucked <WH5265> up like a tree <WH6086>.
He hath also kindled <WH2734> his wrath <WH639> against me <WH2803>, And he counteth me unto him as one of his adversaries <WH6862>.
His troops <WH1416> come <WH935> on together <WH3162>, And cast up <WH5549> their way <WH1870> against me <WH2583>, And encamp round about <WH5439> my tent <WH168>.
He hath put <WH7368> my brethren <WH251> far <WH7368> from me <WH3045>, And mine acquaintance are wholly estranged from me <WH2114>.
My kinsfolk <WH7138> have failed <WH2308>, And my familiar friends <WH3045> have forgotten me <WH7911>.
They that dwell <WH1481> in my house <WH1004>, and my maids <WH519>, count <WH2803> me for a stranger <WH2114>; I am an alien <WH5237> in their sight <WH5869>.
I call <WH7121> unto my servant <WH5650>, and he giveth me no answer <WH6030>, Though I entreat <WH2603> him with <WH1119> my mouth <WH6310>.
My breath <WH7307> is strange <WH2114> to my wife <WH802>, And my supplication <WH2589> to the children <WH1121> of mine own mother <WH990>.
Even young children <WH5759> despise <WH3988> me <WH6965>; If I arise, they speak against me <WH1696>.
All my familiar <WH5475> friends <WH4962> abhor <WH8581> me <WH157>, And they whom I loved are turned against me <WH2015>.
My bone <WH6106> cleaveth <WH1692> to my skin <WH5785> and to my flesh <WH1320>, And I am escaped <WH4422> with the skin <WH5785> of my teeth <WH8127>.
Have pity <WH2603> upon me <WH2603>, have pity upon me <WH7453>, O ye my friends; For the hand <WH3027> of God <WH433> hath touched me <WH5060>.
Why do ye persecute <WH7291> me as God <WH410>, And are not satisfied <WH7646> with my flesh <WH1320>?
Oh that <WH5414> my words <WH4405> were now <WH645> written <WH3789>! Oh that <WH5414> they were inscribed <WH2710> in a book <WH5612>!
That with an iron <WH1270> pen <WH5842> and lead <WH5777> They were graven <WH2672> in the rock <WH6697> for ever <WH5703>!
But as for me I know <WH3045> that my Redeemer <WH1350> liveth <WH2416>, And at last <WH314> he will stand <WH6965> up upon the earth <WH6083>:
And after <WH310> my skin <WH5785>, even this body <WH5362>, is destroyed, Then without my flesh <WH1320> shall I see <WH2372> God <WH433>;
Whom I <WH2372>, even I, shall see, on my side <WH5869>, And mine eyes shall behold <WH7200>, and not as a stranger <WH2114>. My heart <WH3629> is consumed <WH3615> within me <WH2436>.
If ye say <WH559>, How we will persecute <WH7291> him <WH8328>! And that the root of the matter <WH1697> is found in me <WH4672>;
Be ye afraid <WH1481> of the sword <WH2719>: For wrath <WH2534> bringeth the punishments <WH5771> of <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>, That ye may know <WH3045> there is a judgment <WH1779>.
